quest.name: An Enthralling Engagement
journal: Seww needs your help to prevent more needless conflict.

Seww has informed you that the Serpent Reavers have been seen moving prisoners deeper into the Sapsa Spawning Grounds. Certain that the captive soldiers will be─or possibly already have been─subjected to “drowning,” Novv's spawnling is concerned that the incident will trigger an aggressive Maelstrom response. Head to the spawning grounds and free as many imprisoned soldiers as possible, and, failing that, defeat any drowned thralls.
You have freed all of the imprisoned soldiers─in one way or another. Return to Novv's Nursery and report to Seww.

Upon hearing your report, Seww muses on the origins of the Sahagin's Serpent Reaver allies. Though the tattooed pirates are willing followers of Leviathan, the young beastman warrior has witnessed the destructive consequences of their efforts to force others into their faith. Continue to aid Seww when he calls upon you, and do what can be done to limit the damage caused by these kidnapping raids.
objectives: Free imprisoned soldiers and defeat any drowned thralls among them.

dialogue.name: SEWW
dialogue.text: Pshhh... The Shhherpent Reavers have been shhheen in the shhhpawning grounds, herding prisoners to the water's edge. I do not doubt that they mean to offer the captives' shhhouls to the Lord of the Whorl.

dialogue.name: SEWW
dialogue.text: This act of “drowning” our enemies provokeshhh the moshhht volatile reprisals from the shhhorewalkers─I shhhuspect we might react in a shhhimilar manner were our kin forced to worshhhip one of your finleshhh gods.

dialogue.name: SEWW
dialogue.text: Needleshhh to shhhay, avoiding shhhuch reprisals is the very reason you mushhht free as many of these prisoners as you can.

dialogue.name: SEWW
dialogue.text: Pshhh... It is poshhhible that the ceremony has already claimed a number of the shhhorewalkers. Shhhould you find any drowned among the captives, do not hesitate to shhhtrike─for they shhhurely will not.

dialogue.name: SEWW
dialogue.text: Navigate your way through the shhhpawning grounds until you find the captives of which I shhhpeak. Give them what aid they need to eshhhcape.

dialogue.name: SEWW
dialogue.text: But be warned: those that have already shhhuccumbed to drowning will not reshhhpond favorably to a reshhhcue attempt. Shhhlay them─or be shhhlain.

dialogue.name: HURAN
dialogue.text: You...you're not a thrall! The bastards took us while we were on patrol, and I've been waiting for the chance to escape ever since. I'd say now is that time! My thanks, friend.
